column4: Hi you all Ubunters An easy question! I have a GeForce2 MX/MX 400 graphics card, which is quite crappy and compiz runs quite slow. I wanna purchase another graphics card that makes compiz fly. Which one do you recommend me arround 100$?
your problem is going to be that most new cards are PCIe, which won't work in your motherboard
search newegg for the highest number card that fits in a AGP slot under your price range
